definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Time, then, to rehabilitate the alchemists.
sentences.chinese: 而现在时间会为炼金术士们正名。

sentences.english: Well, I've always seen myself as an alchemist, a catalyst for change.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我总认为自己是个炼金术士和变化的催化剂。

sentences.english: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你想做一个炼金术士，还是一个化学家呢？

sentences.english: Not until the 19th century were the gold-making processes of alchemists finally discredited.
sentences.chinese: 一直到19世纪炼金术士的制金方法才为人们所怀疑。

sentences.english: Rissa was the first Alchemist to perfect the art of converting useless soft metals into mercury.
sentences.chinese: 瑞萨是第一个能将无用金属转化成水银的炼金术士。

sentences.english: For example in the future, alchemists are going to be able to make an alchemist specific trinket.
sentences.chinese: 例如将来练金术士可以制作炼金术士特定的饰品。

sentences.english: A German alchemist tried to transmute silver into gold.
sentences.chinese: 一位德国的炼金术士试图将白银炼成黄金。

sentences.english: Alchemists also became expert at spotting cases of fraud.
sentences.chinese: 炼金术士也是辨别污点证人真假的专家。

sentences.english: Welcome to the anime, Full Metal Alchemist.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎动画，全金属炼金术士。

sentences.english: The alchemist conjures a manifestation of the alchemical principal of vitriol.
sentences.chinese: 炼金术士借助炼金术将硫酸固化成型。

sentences.english: The alchemists also discovered some elements, such as phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 炼金术士们还发现了磷等其他元素。

sentences.english: If you want to make potions, then be an Alchemist.
sentences.chinese: 例如如果想制作药水，可以成为炼金术士。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
